website_summaries.verdict: A stealthy design for a jacket that appears inconspicuous but will step up when needed most.
pros: provides an insulated layer that adapts to several conditions
Customers appreciate the classic, simple design that holds up over time
Also works for other cold-weather activities like hiking
Comes in lots of fashionable colors
cons: The fabric may feel thin for some, but it does layer well

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is not as warm as it states to be. Also when I received it, there were dirty tissues in the pocket and someone's ski pass. Wasn't brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Brita

customer_reviews.title: Great snowboarding jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. I use it for snowboarding at Colorado resorts (Keystone, Copper, Winter, etc.) so no backcountry. I love the rich color and all the pockets. The interior chest pocket is handy for a phone instead of keeping it in your pants. I love the snow skirt and underarm zippers as well. Unlike other reviewers, I don't find the zippers uncomfortable at all but since I bought the coat, I've been wearing it with a baselayer and a fleece so I don't feel them at all. Coming from someone who hates wearing coats and especially puffy coats, I love this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: smldrnheap

customer_reviews.title: Bought down a size fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Wore it at Breckenridge in 30degree weather. Had on three base layers needed them bc I was cold w just two. Took a star away bc I'm a medium but I had a problem w another Burton jacket so I knew better when I ordered this. Had tank, under and patagonia on or then burton tech hoodie and felt better once I was riding. Fits nicely. I'm a medium bought a small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, if you're curvy consider going up a size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend. She needed a moderately insulated winter jacket and really loved the styling and functionality. However, she's about 5'2" and curvy (hips, butt, shoulders) and the medium did not fit her, particularly through the shoulders. I'm concerned a large will be too long so the item may be returned instead of exchanged. Otherwise there's a lot to love about the jacket!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Love this coat
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! I bought the XL Rifle Green and I have recieved so many compliments on it. I would say it fits true to size because I also own the same coat in a size large which is what size I usually wear in tops but I couldn't wear layers under the coat and get it zipped. I don't notice the zippers in the armpit too much at all. It's very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Greytak

customer_reviews.title: great coat
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fall coat.. I wore this while i was hiking in Iceland in October and it was absolutely perfect. It is waterproof and wind proof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nad87

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I've found a right size jacket! I'm 5.5, 95lb, ordered in xxs, fits perfect! It's not so warm, and I saw few reviews, where people was complaining about it, but it's written on a description of this jacket. Just need to look on insulation weight. It's beautiful and a good quality. Arrived in a 2 days, much earlier than expected! Very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Rad Jacket Rad Design 🤙
customer_reviews.text: Great quality jacket, this will be my fourth jacket from Burton in my lifetime and I’ve loved all of them. I am 5’5” and 128lbs and ordered a medium because I like to have extra space but I totally could’ve gotten away with a small. The print is crazy on the eyes and I love it. Thermal pocket for phone inside as well as mesh goggles pocket. Outside of jacket has two pockets and armpit zipper vents. Shipped and delivered quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzi

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this jacket. She is tall and very thin. Probably not the best for fully figured gals. Runs a wee bit narrow. Wish there were more hidden pockets like other ski/snow boarding jackets. Also, wish they had the built-in inner sleeves that go over your finger like other jackets (help prevent snow getting onto the wrist and help keep hands warm). This wasn't MY favorite jacket for my daughter.... but I think my daughter loves it because it's Burton.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Kizer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit throughout chest
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward fit. Was extremely tight in the chest, but loose in the waist. So for small boobs and a pot belly?? I sent it back right away. Weird, because an XS in Burton is my size...
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, stays warm, great colors!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this jacket for about a year now and it’s probably the best thing I have while snowboarding. I usually always wear lots of layers but if I just wear a crewneck underneath and this jacket, I stay so warm! The pocket zippers are perfectly designed. When the pocket is closed, the zipper is at the bottom of the jacket, so if you have your pass or something else hanging on the zipper it won’t open your pocket while you’re playing on the mountain. The only thing I don’t like about the jacket is that there isn’t a pocket by my chest to put my phone in so it stays warm and doesn’t shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Siple

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable zippers under arms!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is very nice, well made, fits just a bit small. The main issue is that there are vent zippers under the armpits and they are really really uncomfortable. I will be returning mine and I am disappointed because everything else about it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Justin May

customer_reviews.title: I love this coat
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! The only thing it lacks is wrist gaiters, which would make it just a bit cozier. I've worn it on a chilly ski day with an extra layer, and it's plenty warm. It did fit snugger than I expected, so I had to size up from a small to a medium in order to fit a fleece underneath on the colder days. I'm 5'4", 125lbs and the medium gives me that extra roominess/comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Westisbest

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and the quality of this jacket but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the quality of this jacket but it is a little large on me. The sleeves just about covered my hands when my arms are down at my sides. I was afraid that the canvas would be more cream than white and I am happy to say that it is more white than cream. Lots of hidden pockets for a variety of different things which is fun. I'm very excited to use this jacket but will have to exchange it for a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Burton doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size small and it was a little roomy but I wouldn’t want my coat to be tight. It’s very high quality and it will keep me warm and dry when the winter comes.
customer_reviews.author: adriann

customer_reviews.title: i love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: i love this jacket. I read mixed reviews on it before buying as some people did not like the zipper under their arms. I don't even know its there! i forgot i even had the luxury of opening them up when we were on the slopes! I am a medium in all my clothing so i ordered the medium jacket and it fit perfectly. The color is also almost spot on from the picture. Not as bright though. I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Wind and waterproof. Great for the slopes. Keeps me warm with the proper base layer. Sleeve length is good. I’d even consider buying the same jacket in a different color. :)
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Great skiing coat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new coat that I use for skiing. I wanted different pattern than what I've been wearing and this coat it very unique looking. It was delivered on time, fits as expected from the size chart, and kept me warm in the snow! And the online price was way better than my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is true to size, lightweight, and warm. My first time wearing it was in -0 degree weather with a wind chill. I only accompanied it with a few layers and I stayed warm enough for a day of snowboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" and was looking for a lightweight (yet able to layer underneath) jacket for skiing--not too short, not too long like many snowboarding jackets tend to be. This jacket is perfect for my height and I love the style...the black is more of a stylish soft black and fits beautifully in the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fit and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this jacket. I’ve had an older version of this same jacket for years but needed to size up because of those COVID pounds. It’s fits the body nicely and keeps me so toasty warm in the Northeast. I usually wear women’s size S/M tops but I have wide hips - size Large fits my hips perfectly and doesn’t leave too much excess material up top.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Such a great jacket for riding and the snow!! Very water resistant, I’ll throw it on when it’s raining too and it’s lightweight. Super cute!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Great coat. Perfect for skiing or snowboarding. Has the normal characteristics of a ski/snow jacket- fairly lightweight. I am 5'9" 130lbs and the medium fit very comfortably with a base layer and large fleece under it. The jacket has a nice shape to it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ski jacket
customer_reviews.text: Color is awesome. Fit is a little big but I wanted it roomy so I could layer under. Pockets were fine no problems. Warm enough for all day on the mountain with layers.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgety14

customer_reviews.title: I usually fit an L-size t-shirt for a comfortable fit but i bought this in M and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually fit an L-size t-shirt for a comfortable fit but i bought this in M and it fits extremely well, not too big or small with enough space to fit in a few more layers or a sweater. Glad I didn't get it in L. I have yet to try it in the snow but the material is thicker than your usual raincoat. My only wish is that hood should be detachable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit, warm
customer_reviews.text: Burton makes high quality products. worth the price. I find I can wear this coat with a long sleeve underneath and be nice and toasty on the Utah slopes. This coat will last me several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and low insulated. Definitely don’t buy if you ski/snowboard below 45 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: Super thin coat! Spring or fall coat, definitely not a winter coat. Very surprised it’s considered a snowboarding coat. I bought this brand for my oldest daughter years ago. Not the same quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: After trying on my friends Burton snowboarding jacket, I was super excited to purchase my own. After tons of research on the best combination of warmth and water resistance, I choose this jacket. I have never been so excited to receive an item of clothing. It is extremely well-made and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Solid ski/snowboard jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kept me warm while skiing in 20 degrees Fahrenheit with just a thin base layer and fleece zip up. The interior pockets and powder skirt are nice. Doesn’t have underarm vents sadly. The color is also less vibrant in person.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Pike

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket, fit as expected and the color is a gorgeous jewel tone. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Barba

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket. I live in Florida and it actually does get cold here but I mostly us it for traveling. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia schatz

customer_reviews.title: color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This Burton jacket is nice and lives up to Burton's quality, but it is much more a KHAKI color and not a cream or ivory color as pictured. It was hard to check the color based on the name "Hawk Heather", so we went by the picture. Disappointed with the color or I would have given it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: J A Linn

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because of the color and love it!!! Super warm and long. I am 5'11 and 145 and a med fit me great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and keeps you very warm while still giving you great mobility.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Pockets design are not great for skiing as the lower front pockets with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a very technical garment. But serves its purpose as a cold weather jacket with room under for a light puffer. Pockets design are not great for skiing as the lower front pockets with a phone or something in them hit your thighs and the top pocket is small velcro closure only. I would not trust keys, money, credit cards or phone in inside pocket.
customer_reviews.author: genine regante

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Paid $170 for this jacket and wore it once before zipper broke. Of course, it is just past the return window so I'm stuck with a overpriced jacket that I get to toss in the trash :( Have never been disappointed with an Amazon purchase (and have had MANY) until now.
customer_reviews.author: thelawinok

customer_reviews.title: Cute and light
customer_reviews.text: Cute jacket! It's lightweight and looks to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight yet warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric and the fit of this jacket. It’s lightweight yet very warm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ncrosetto

customer_reviews.title: It has been tested on the ski hill and works ...
customer_reviews.text: It has been tested on the ski hill and works quite well. It kept me warm and fit as it should in all the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Color as shown
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the color, haven’t had a chance to try it out on the slopes yet. She is excited about all the extra pockets and the tie to her snowboard pants to keep the snow from going under her coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay down very well and I get a lot of snow on my back when I snowboard.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua I.

customer_reviews.title: I only gave it a 4 because the jacket is super cute and they have free returns
customer_reviews.text: Hood droops over the eyes, and can't see out of it. I only gave it a 4 because the jacket is super cute and they have free returns!
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, not small
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally Size 8. Description warns that jacket runs small, so I ordered a Large and was absolutely swimming in it. It is huge! It's a great jacket, but I have to exchange it for a Medium. Wish I hadn't paid attention to the size warning.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I hate wearing bulky clothes to keep warm
customer_reviews.text: The coat fits perfectly. I hate wearing bulky clothes to keep warm. The very first time I put it on, I was unsure. My husband told me that I needed to wear it in. The next day we went skiing and I felt great wearing it. I have worn it every day since. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The media picture is deceiving, this jacket does not ...
customer_reviews.text: The media picture is deceiving, this jacket does not have stretchy inner cuffs which hook over your thumb. IT also does not have enough interior pockets. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in perfect conditions. It's the same as in the photos, great quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Wind proof, water proof. Kept me warm at -20f with wind.
customer_reviews.author: Blabla

customer_reviews.title: it is a very pretty canvas and "slim" fitting so you don't look like ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper snow jacket that was similar in quality but kept the Burton. First off, it is a very pretty canvas and "slim" fitting so you don't look like a giant marshmallow like typical ski jackets ( and why the other one had to be returned). I was able to fit a base layer, thin fleece and vest and did not feel constricted in any way. I also wore a medium weight sweater on another cold night and fit perfectly. I live in New England so I justified the price but even talking with friends who ski, they said it is a great price especially for Burton.
customer_reviews.author: Mariska F. Solodyna

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Arms are nice and long, but dont have velcro cuffs. it was ok with gloves on when snowboarding. Very warm and a nice big hood. super soft around the face and when fully zipped came all the way up to block the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket but the colors were off for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket but the colors were off for me. Was expecting it to be closer to white/light cream but yellower in person
customer_reviews.author: karpouzi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It could be a little more loose on the chest
customer_reviews.author: Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and style of this jacket! Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cute, warm and practical
customer_reviews.text: Super cute super warm has tons of pockets! Received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good for multi seasons.
customer_reviews.text: I would like it if the collar had a drawstring to keep drafts out.
customer_reviews.author: Mochamuni

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket! And the colors are so awesome I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.author: Taizsha Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I like the waist gaiter - keeps the cold air out
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I like the waist gaiter - keeps the cold air out. Keeps you nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: J. O'keefe

customer_reviews.title: Great ski jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It's a great fit--I got a medium and I can comfortably wear 2-3 layers while I'm skiing. It is really warm and very high quality. It also looks great and I love the color. I would definitely recommend this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter but she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Weisbrot

customer_reviews.title: Color is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is a little bit big and more of a rain jacket type. Color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja

customer_reviews.title: Costs 5.00 to return this ill fitting jacket.
customer_reviews.text: The torso is just wrong and ill proportioned to the sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Silcoff

customer_reviews.title: Gift for daughter she loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter- she loves this for snowboarding - item was as described - my daughter has somewhat of an athletic build to her, she is 5'3" and she likes the fit of the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: The product appears to be used not new
customer_reviews.text: Product had no tags looked worn. Crammed into a small bag so came all wrinkled and smelled funny
customer_reviews.author: grace angelo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! It’s light, not bulky and so warm
customer_reviews.author: CEO Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.text: It was not the adequate description, wrong color. Return this item And company charged me even after it was returned to them.. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great in subzero temps!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm, comfy jacket. Wore it in Iceland during sub zero temps and it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hastings

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT ski jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket!! Its a perfect fit. It kept me warm in 14°/snowing weather while I was snowboarding!!
customer_reviews.author: Margie Loewen

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size XS. It fits perfectly with ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size XS. It fits perfectly with room for layers. I am 5’5” and 118lbs for reference. This jacket seems well made and warm. I’m excited to try it out on the mountain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Ordered xs, fits perfect, tried on a small in a store and they do run a little bit big. Beautiful, warm coat!
customer_reviews.author: Kutie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you like buttons!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this jacket, just what I was looking for; however, there are these really cool buttons and 4 of them have already fallen off within a month. This is just devestating as I have not found a good way to replace them, and now I'm not sure I even want to keep the jacket around with a bunch of holes in it where buttons should be.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this jacket. I'm 130 and 5'5 and a medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Great color but didn't keep me warm
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the color (Mood Indigo Fleck) and styling. Bought it to wear to the hockey rink so tested it by sitting on a chair in the garage. It did not keep me at all warm so I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: AngelRose

customer_reviews.title: my favorite skiing jacket so far
customer_reviews.text: great jacket. kept me warm, nice fabric... I wish it didn't look so juvenile but I look younger anyways. It doesn't go up when you put your arms up!!! this is a great achievement, so congrats to the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: My sweetheart loves her new waterproof snowboarding jacket. It makes her look lean while staying warm and toasty. Lots of winter coats/jackets are too bulky and give a woman that big bloated look. The Burton Jet Set Jacket is perfect in every facet. It looks good and is warm and dry. It is exactly what she wanted for Christmas. She has used it in rain and snow thus far and is very satisfied with the jacket. I highly recommend this jacket to anyone who wants to stay warm and dry, while looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Rothman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect transaction and the gift was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: You might have to layer clothing to get the warmth you want in freezing weather.
customer_reviews.author: M.Sanders

customer_reviews.title: very nice jacket, but fit was very thin
customer_reviews.text: very nice jacket, but fit was very thin. I'm fit and usually a size 4, but this was uncomfortably tight.
customer_reviews.author: gulia

customer_reviews.title: ... to the pattern of the fabric make it an excellent option for snow sports for women and girls
customer_reviews.text: The shape in waist contour and arms next to the pattern of the fabric make it an excellent option for snow sports for women and girls. The performance in the snow will make it my wife in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter really likes the pattern of this jacket, ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes the pattern of this jacket, just wish it was warmer. She has to wear an extra layer when snowboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

product_meta.title: Burton Women's Jet Set Jacket
product_meta.description: The women's bestselling Burton Jet Set Jacket combines warmth with a functional yet flattering slim fit for a look that pairs well with anything in your closet. Dumping snow to spring showers are no match for the richly textured waterproof and breathable DRYRIDE 2L fabrics, which are offered in patterns ranging from classic single-colored to standout tribal. 40% recycled content THERMOLITE insulation joins forces with our exclusive thermo-regulating Living Lining for the ultimate in adaptable warmth and consistent comfort.
feature_bullets: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you
Dryride two-layer fabric [10, 000mm, 10, 000g] is waterproof and breathable for outstanding weather protection; critically taped seams keep the elements out

Living Lining Mapped with THERMOLITE [80g Body, 40g Hood] and Taffeta regulates body temperature, adapting to ups and downs of your activity; helmet compatible attached Contour Hood with dropped construction and Front adjustment
Mesh-lined Sleeve Vents add breathability; snag-free Neckline for comfort; media and goggle pocket and mesh Dump Pocket for storage; pocket access hem Cinch secures the fit
Magic Stitch Removable Waist Gaiter with Jacket-to-Pant Interface seals out snow; standard jacket features include: Pit Zips, glove loops, and pocket key clip
